svg.text:
Type: string Values: - UK.OBIE.SCA - UK.OBIE.SCANotRequired
PSUAuthenticationMethods [1..*]

Type: string Values: - InSession - OffSession
PSUInteractionTypes [0..*]

Type: string Values: - UK.OBIE.VRPType.Sweeping - UK.OBIE.VRPType.Other
VRPType [1..*]

Type: string Format: date-time Description: ^ Start date time for which the consent remains valid.
ValidFromDateTime [0..1]

Type: string Format: date-time Description: ^ End date time for which the consent remains valid.
ValidToDateTime [0..1]

Type: string Description: A number of monetary units specified in an active currency where the unit of currency is explicit and compliant with ISO 4217. Pattern: ^\d{1,13}$|^\d{1,13}\.\d{1,5}$
Amount [1..1]

Type: string MinLength: 3 MaxLength: 3 Description: A code allocated to a currency by a Maintenance Agency under an international identification scheme, as described in the latest edition of the international standard ISO 4217 "Codes for the representation of currencies and funds". Pattern: ^[A-Z]{3,3}$
Currency [1..1]

Type: string Description: A number of monetary units specified in an active currency where the unit of currency is explicit and compliant with ISO 4217. Pattern: ^\d{1,13}$|^\d{1,13}\.\d{1,5}$
Amount [1..1]

Type: string MinLength: 3 MaxLength: 3 Description: A code allocated to a currency by a Maintenance Agency under an international identification scheme, as described in the latest edition of the international standard ISO 4217 "Codes for the representation of currencies and funds". Pattern: ^[A-Z]{3,3}$
Currency [1..1]

Type: string Description: ^ Specifies whether the period starts on the date of consent creation or lines up with a calendar Values: - Consent - Calendar
PeriodAlignment [1..1]

Type: string Description: ^ Period type for this period limit Values: - Day - Week - Fortnight - Month - Half-year - Year
PeriodType [1..1]
^ Additional information that can not be captured in the structured fields and/or any other specific block SupplementaryData
